title: Patch 6.6 Kennen Ult Invisible on ARAM
body: I just finished a game of ARAM at 11:42PM CDT and the Kennen on the enemy team would ult and the sound effects would occur but there was no vision of his Ult at all. He did this probably 4 or 5 times throughout the game with no vision on any of them. At the end of the game he also reported that he wasn't able to see his ult either.

replies.body:
Hey Mac Mather! 

Thanks for the report! We've seen a few instances of the occurring, but haven't been able to find a solid repro for this. We're still in the process of investigating.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=2HUhAehZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-25T16:22:30.629+0000)
>
> Hey Mac Mather! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! We've seen a few instances of the occurring, but haven't been able to find a solid repro for this. We're still in the process of investigating.

hey mr rito man why cant I play league please fix this bug with the reconnect after a game stuff I wanna play and I'm missing out on ip and lp not cool

Hey milliumplatypi2 - 

I work on the skins team, so I'm unfortunately not the best person for the job here. :c If you shoot a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to Player Support, they'd be happy to help you troubleshoot. Or, if your're referring to a larger issue that's not just affecting you (which sounds more likely) please [create a new bug report](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
